text: Wish upon a Pike () is a 1938 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.Сердце страны: русская провинция готова к новомуПо щучьему веленью It stars Pyotr Savin, Maria Kravchunovskaya, and Georgy Millyar. ==Actors== * Pyotr Savin as Yemelya * Maria Kravchunovskaya as Yemelya's mother * Georgy Millyar as Tsar Gorokh * Sofia Terenteva as Princess Who Never Smiled * Lev Potyomkin as General One-Two == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 movies Category:1930s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Wish upon a Pike
